69 TEST(TransformBroadcaster, transform)
70 {
71  tf2_ros::Buffer buffer;
72  tf2_ros::TransformListener listener(buffer);
73 
74  ros::Duration(1.0).sleep();
75 
76  bool lookupSucceeded = buffer.canTransform("a", "c", ros::Time::now(), ros::Duration(1.0));
77  ASSERT_TRUE(lookupSucceeded);
78 
79  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped transform = buffer.lookupTransform("a", "c", ros::Time::now());
80  EXPECT_NEAR(1, transform.transform.translation.x, 1e-6);
81  EXPECT_NEAR(2, transform.transform.translation.y, 1e-6);
82  EXPECT_NEAR(3, transform.transform.translation.z, 1e-6);
83  EXPECT_NEAR(0.585792, transform.transform.rotation.x, 1e-6);
84  EXPECT_NEAR(0.143757, transform.transform.rotation.y, 1e-6);
85  EXPECT_NEAR(0.756334, transform.transform.rotation.z, 1e-6);
86  EXPECT_NEAR(-0.253261, transform.transform.rotation.w, 1e-6);
87 }
